00030 /**
00031  * Class for the flexform 'select' field
00032  *
00033  * @author      Jean-David Gadina <macmade@eosgarden.com>
00034  * @version     1.0
00035  * @package     TYPO3
00036  * @subpackage  oop
00037  */
00038 class tx_oop_Flexform_Field_Section_Element_Field_Select extends tx_oop_Flexform_Field_Select
00039 {
00040     /**
00041      * The section name
00042      */
00043     protected $_sectionName = '';
00044     
00045     /**
00046      * The section element name
00047      */
00048     protected $_elementName = '';
00049     
00050     /**
00051      * Class constructor
00052      * 
00053      * @param   string  The name of the field
00054      * @param   string  The name of the sheet
00055      * @param   string  The reference of the file with the labels for the flexform (typically: EXT:extkey/path/to/lang/file)
00056      * @return  NULL
00057      */
00058     public function __construct(  $name, $elementName, $sectionName, $sheetName, $langFile )
00059     {
00060         // Calls the parent constructor
00061         parent::__construct( $name, $sheetName, $langFile );
00062         
00063         // Stores the section and the element name
00064         $this->_sectionName             = ( string )$sectionName;
00065         $this->_elementName             = ( string )$elementName;
00066         
00067         // Field label
00068         $this->_properties[ 'label' ]   = 'LLL:'
00069                                         . $this->_langFile
00070                                         . ':'
00071                                         . $this->_sheetName
00072                                         . '.'
00073                                         . $this->_sectionName
00074                                         . '.'
00075                                         . $this->_elementName
00076                                         . '.'
00077                                         . $this->_name;
00078     }
00079     
00080     /**
00081      * 
00082      */
00083     public function addItem( $value, $label = '' )
00084     {
00085         if( !isset( $this->_config[ 'items' ] ) || !is_array( $this->_config[ 'items' ] ) ) {
00086             
00087             $this->_config[ 'items' ] = array();
00088         }
00089         
00090         $labelPrefix = 'LLL:'
00091                      . $this->_langFile
00092                      . ':'
00093                      . $this->_sheetName
00094                      . '.'
00095                      . $this->_sectionName
00096                      . '.'
00097                      . $this->_elementName
00098                      . '.';
00099         $label       = ( $label ) ? $labelPrefix . $label : $labelPrefix . $this->_name . '.I.' . $value;
00100         
00101         $this->_config[ 'items' ][] = array( $label, $value );
00102     }
00103 }
